title: League client black screen (Preseason S8) 2017
body:
After i start client it shows only black screen and all i can do is end task it . 
https://imgur.com/a/cSWw3

replies.body: Something might be interfering with League trying to open. Do me a favor and try a clean boot really quick and let me know if League is able to open normally that way.

I am having a similar issue. Restarting my pc doesn't help. The only way I have found to get around this is to reinstall the client. Once I do this it works but if I close the client at all after the reinstall I encounter the same issue.
